title: The Anniversary Icon
body: I know you're supposed to wait if you haven't gotten it yet, but i've already gotten Kayle and her riot skin, so how come i haven't gotten the summoner's icon? I really want it, do I keep waiting?

replies.body: The gifts are being sent individually, so you may not get everything all at once.  Gifts are still being sent out per our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Hang tight!

Yes, you just have to keep waiting. Each gift is being given out separately, so it's normal to receive one before the others. The final day for the gifts is the 23rd, so if you haven't received it by then, you can submit a support ticket.
